name: chirper
author: Platypi
description: ## Info/Setup * This project will be building on project 1 * Copy your package.json and client and server folders to this project folder * Make sure this project folder has a `.gitignore` file with an entry for `node_modules` * Run npm install on this project to install all your dependencies you need * You should already have html files in your client folder for welcome, list, single view, and single update * You will be transitioning this site to use AngularJS
